content: wee speedy 2 is a super-fast to knit baby sweater and only takes an hour or so to make from start to finish this is knit top down and you will only have 2 ends to weave in the adorable handmade button can be found in the etsy shop katrinkles 1 for a smaller version here 2 1 https //www etsy com/shop/katrinkles 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wee-speedy
